title: Weekly Board Game League
description: Competitive gaming with prizes for winners! Join our weekly league and compete against other board game enthusiasts.

title: Trivia Night
description: Test your knowledge across various categories! Teams of up to 4 players compete for great prizes.

title: Themed Dinner Night: Medieval Feast
description: Special medieval-themed menu paired with games like Catan, Carcassonne, and more. Costumes encouraged!

title: Family Game Day
description: Perfect for families with children! Kid-friendly games and special children's menu available.

title: Strategy Game Tournament
description: Monthly tournament featuring complex strategy games. This month: Wingspan vs. Terraforming Mars!
